ISSUE.TITLE: A user that is granted permissions to a dashboard cannot grant permissions to others for the dashboard
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Copies https://github.com/mozilla/redash/issues/346 Making an issue to submit a PR against.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #2 from getredash/master pulling from upstream to SV fork

COMMIT.MESSAGE: add error message when non owner tries to add a user to a dashboard fixes #2592 REDASH_FEATURE_SHOW_PERMISSIONS_CONTROL has to equal true for this to be applicable. Operation does throw a 403 Forbidden error before this change but it is in the console not shown to the user.

Throw error when non-owner tries to add a user to dashboard permissions (#2650) Add error message when non owner tries to add a user to a dashboard Fixes #2592 REDASH_FEATURE_SHOW_PERMISSIONS_CONTROL has to be true for this to be applicable. Operation threw a 403 Forbidden error before this change but it is in the console not shown to the user.
